description:
Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!
Chahige Hitsuu! Luffy Ikari no Ichigeki
Le cri de Barbe Brune. La colère de Luffy !
¡La frustración de Chahige! El ataque de ira de Luffy
Горечь Коричневой Бороды! Гневная атака Луффи!
اللّحية البنّيّة حزين! يشنّ لوفي ضربةً غاضبة!
茶ひげ悲痛! ルフィ怒りの一撃
